docs.lead_paragraph: Donna Butts, who directs the advocacy organization Generations United, recently watched the promo for the new season of "Survivor" with a churning stomach.

headline.main: Wanted: An Island With Room for All

docs.abstract: The new "Survivor" series picks up on a theme heard in statehouses and in Congress: young versus old.
docs.snippet: The new "Survivor" series picks up on a theme heard in statehouses and in Congress: young versus old.

docs.lead_paragraph: Medicare does not cover everything. Closely vet hospital costs and if you can, shop around beforehand.

docs.lead_paragraph: Allowing anyone to use “white spaces” in the spectrum would open the door to supercharged Wi-Fi networks.

headline.seo: F.C.C. Is to Open Unlicensed Airwaves to Wireless Innovators
headline.main: F.C.C. Likely to Open New Airwaves to Wireless
headline.sub: F.C.C. Is Likely to Open the Unused Airwaves to Wireless Innovators;
headline.print_headline:
More Bandwidth in More Places, and Maybe Lifting the Economy: F.C.C. Is Likely to Open
The Unused Airwaves
To Wireless Innovators

docs.snippet: Allowing anyone to use “white spaces” in the spectrum would open the door to supercharged Wi-Fi networks.

docs.lead_paragraph: As stimulus payments start to fade, President Obama’s proposed $50 billion infrastructure renewal bank would be at least a start toward fixing neglected roads and bridges.

headline.main: Building the Bridges to a Sustainable Recovery
